title: Self-Contained Apartment Stay for Couples and Families
description: Get away from it all and embrace some sun, sand and surf with a trip to Sandcastles 1770 Motel & Resort. Nestled between the towns of 1770 and Agnes Water, Queensland, it's the perfect spot for a romantic retreat or family escape, with One-Bedroom and Two-Bedroom Beach Homes on offer, only steps away from one of Australiaâ€™s most pristine beaches. Or indulge in a bit of extra luxury and upgrade to a Two-Bedroom Beach Home with a private plunge pool for the ultimate relaxing beachside holiday. Includes a bottle of wine,  welcome hamper on arrival, dining credit, guaranteed early check-in and late check-out and local discounts.
offer_address: 40 Captain Cook Dr, Agnes Water QLD 4677
